description:
The mind of a trail runner meets the body of a hiking shoe, the Aerios Aura is designed for rapid travel in remote and varied conditions. The highly durable fabric upper offers a snug and secure fit, like a running shoe, and the TPU overlay and toecap protects the high-wear areas. An integrated TPU shank keeps your feet stable and supported in uneven terrain.

  • Recycled polyester mesh upper is highly breathable
  • Durable TPU film overlay and TPU toecap resist abrasion and protect feet from trail bumps
  • 3D moulded footbed delivers maximum comfort, breathability and arch support
  • Compressed EVA midsole cushions underfoot and an integrated TPU shank adds stability on technical trails
  • Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber outsole provides confident footing in varied terrain
name: Arc'teryx Aerios Aura Trail Running Shoes - Men's
